metadata.name: The Rhinestone Cowboy
metadata.description:
Medium: Digital Oil Pastel (Procreate)

Size: 21 cm x 29.7 cm

Description:
''Hold the cold one like he hold a old gun
Like he hold the microphone and stole the show for fun''

The lyrics of MF Doom served as a key inspiration for this piece, with the artist drawing on the rapper's words to create a visually striking and evocative image. 

The piece speaks to the power of music and performance, as well as the sense of control and mastery that can come with "holding a microphone or an old gun."
